name: Terry Topo Saddle - Women's
description: From all-day single-track adventures, to hammering up fire roads and dropping in, this saddle keeps you comfy where it counts. With a narrow profile and flat rear platform this saddle is supportive in the climbs yet tucks out of the way nicely when dropped.Wide pressure relief cut-out makes long rides a lot more comfortable.Durable synthetic vinyl top is easy to clean.Debossed topographic map of Vermont's Kingdom trail network.Steel alloy rails balance weight and strength.
